Combinatorics using direct calculation of combinations
problem_summary_simple: Find ways to draw k non-overlapping line segments of length at least 2 on n points.
problem_summary_technical: Model as stars and bars problem: k segments (length >= 2) and k+1 gaps (length >= 0) sum to n-1. Equivalent to C(n+k-1, 2k).
key_insights: The problem can be rephrased using stars and bars.
Each segment of length at least 2 can be thought of as choosing 2 endpoints and having a length of at least 1 between them.
The transformation leads to choosing 2k points from n+k-1 available positions.
